A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The story felt rushed\, there were parts that were just plain goofy (like the AWFUL flying Leia scene)\, and it just felt overall unremarkable. I wish they could take this movie back to the studio to do it over\, but alas\, this extremely unlikely. There WERE parts that were very cool\, visually stunning\, and thrilling\, but overall I think the movie left me feeling dissatisfied.
